Example

Ext.create('Ext.Panel', {
    width: 500,
    height: 300,
    layout: {
        type: 'vbox',
        align: 'stretch'
    },
    renderTo: document.body,
    defaults: {
        style: 'background: blue',
        margin: 5
    },
    items: [{
        xtype: 'container',
        flex: 2
    },{
        xtype: 'container',
        flex: 1
    },{
        xtype: 'container',
        flex: 1
    }]
});
